affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.
notes:
Death Pulse can't be disjointed.
Can heal Spell Immune units.
cmb:
125/145/165/185
8/7/6/5
lore: Combining his monk heritage with his newfound affinity for plague has a menacing result.
name: necrolyte_death_pulse

affects:
ABILITY: Passive, Aura
AFFECTS: Enemies
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.
notes: Damage won't disable items like Blink Dagger.
lore: Those who come within a short distance of Necrophos can feel pestilence and plague in the air.
name: necrolyte_heartstopper_aura

desc: Necrophos gains hp and mana regeneration for every unit he kills. Hero kills grant 10x the regen bonus.
notes:
Sadist is also triggered by denies.
Stacks independently with itself.
lore: Poor souls who succumb to Rotund'jere's plagues are recycled for future use.
name: necrolyte_sadist

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have 30 seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Damage is dealt at the end of the stun.
The stun goes through spell immunity, but not the damage.
attrib:
DAMAGE PER MISSING HP: 0.4/0.6/0.9
STUN DURATION: 1.5/1.5/1.5
SCEPTER MANA COST: 150/340/500
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 70
SCEPTER DAMAGE PER MISSING HP: 0.6/0.9/1.2
ADDED RESPAWN TIME: 30
cmb:
175/340/500
100/85/70
lore: The amount of death and suffering in the air increases the power of Necrophos's plague magic.
name: necrolyte_reapers_scythe
